00007 #ifndef CHILDCOMMON_H
00008 #define CHILDCOMMON_H
00009 
00010 #define WINLISTERCLASSNAME "ADFOpusWindowsFileList"
00011 #define AMILISTERCLASSNAME "ADFOpusAmigaFileList"
00012 
00013 #include "ADFLib.h"
00014 
00015 typedef struct _DIRENTRY {
00016     char    name[MAX_PATH];
00017     long    size;
00018     char    flags[9];
00019     int     icon;
00020     struct  _DIRENTRY *next;
00021 } DIRENTRY;
00022 
00023 typedef struct _CHILDINFO {
00024     BOOL            isAmi;              /* true if Amiga, false if Windows */
00025     HWND            lv;                 /* handle of listview control */
00026     HWND            sb;                 /* handle of status bar */
00027     char            curDir[MAX_PATH];   /* current directory */
00028     int             totalCount;         /* total no. of files or dirs */
00029     BOOL            atRoot;             /* true if at root dir */
00030     DIRENTRY        *content;           /* head of directory contents list */
00031     struct Device   *dev;
00032     struct Volume   *vol;
00033     BOOL            readOnly;
00034     enum DiskFormat dfDisk;             // Disk format.
00035     int             compSize;           // Size of compressed disk image.
00036     char            orig_path[MAX_PATH];// Path to original (un/compressed) file.
00037     char            temp_path[MAX_PATH];// Path to temp work adf file.
00038 } CHILDINFO;
00039 
00040 HWND CreateChildWin(HWND, long);
00041 LRESULT CALLBACK ChildWinProc(HWND, UINT, WPARAM, LPARAM);
00042 int GetFileFromADF(struct Volume *vol, char *szFileName);   // Extract a file from an ADF.

00044 // Updated ci and file name accessed by Properties.c.
00045 CHILDINFO   *ci;
00046 char        buf[MAX_PATH];
00047 HMENU       hMenu;
